library(tidyverse)

data	<-	read_csv("C:/Users/Kevin Chiu/Desktop/Data Vis/cs329e-project-4/NCHS_Leading_Causes_of_Death__United_States.csv",
  col_types =	cols(
    Year =	col_integer(),
    113 Cause Name =	col_character(),
    Cause Name =	col_character(),
    State =	col_string(),
    Deaths =	col_integer(),
    Age-adjusted Death Rate = col_number()
)) %>% dplyr::select(1:7) %>% dplyr::filter(State != 'United States' and Deaths != null)

names(data)

for(n in names(data)) {
  data[n] <- data.frame(lapply(data[n], gsub, pattern="[^ -~]", replacement= ""))
}
write_csv(data, "C:/Users/Kevin Chiu/Desktop/Data Vis/new_cause_of_death.csv")
